# Numpy

## Objectives
- Use numpy for working with numbers and tables of numbers
- Do fast math on arrays (instead of writing loops)
- Introduction to indexing, broadcasting

## Topics
- Create arrays with numpy
- Reshape and slice arrays
- Do stats with .mean(), .sum(), etc.
- Work along rows or columns (axis)
- Intro to broadcasting
